issue.title: Make a Simple Gripper: "View->Joints" joint visualization scale problem

content.raw:
We reduced the size of the joint visuals on purpose because they were too big, especially for hands, which have lots of joints ([gazebo issue 1563](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/1563/scale-joint-visuals)). If you turn transparency on it should be easier to see.

The screenshots could be updated of course.
